title: Epsilon (formerly Conversant) Adapter Params
description: A schema which validates params accepted by the Epsilon (Conversant) adapter.

site_id.description: An Epsilon (Conversant) specific ID which identifies the site.

secure.description: Override http/https context on ad markup.

bidfloor.description: Minimum bid price that will be considered.

mimes.description: Array of content MIME types.  For videos only.

maxduration.description: Maximum duration in seconds.  For videos only.

api.description: Array of supported API frameworks.  For videos only.

protocols.description: Array of supported video protocols.  For videos only.
